name: Flower Devourer
description:
You are the Flower Devourer. Eat the red flowers!

Try to get to 200/200 Flower Power!

How to play:

  • WASD to walk around
  • Mouse to look around
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Left Click to fly forwards. Do not use WASD when flying.
  • Escape to close the game

A short game I made over the course of ~5 days for the Summer 2022 Tomato Jam
